citations.narrative:
On two occasions a male Andean (Spectacled) bear was able to break through a section of his enclosure fence and
escape from the enclosure. These occurred on Feb. 7th and Feb. 23rd. In both incidents the bear was safely recaptured
and returned to its enclosure within approximately one hour. There was no injury to the bear, any other animals, or any
person in either incident.
The facility failed to maintain the primary enclosure in a condition to contain the bear. This could have resulted in injury or
death to the bear. The facility needs to ensure enclosures are structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect
animals from injury and to contain the animals.
The bear is currently being housed in a secure off-exhibit enclosure. The facility must ensure that the bear’s indoor and
outdoor housing facility is constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for him, and to always contain
him, before his return to exhibit.
Correction date: September 1st, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section
